13.question: Why did composers manipulate conventions of string quartet form for their audiences?
13.correct: Because audiences for quartets (commonly upper classes) enjoyed musical literacy and were educated on the form, so manipulating conventions surprised and delighted them.
incorrect: Because President Namjoon asked them to
Because audiences for quartets (commonly upper and middle classes) enjoyed hearing the slight tweaks in convention, as it made it much more interesting for them to listen to.
Because audiences for quartets (commonly upper classes) did not enjoy hearing differences from convention, and the composers liked to annoy them.

17.question: When did Haydn hear the quartets that Mozart dedicated to him?

18.question: What did Haydn say to the father Leopold when he was visiting from Salzburg?
18.correct: Before God, as an honest man, I tell you that your son is the greatest composer known to me either in person or by name. He has taste, and, what is more, the profound knowledge of composition.'
incorrect: BTS is the greatest band ever to form. Their music is wonderfully splendid and your son Wolfgang is quite a horrible composer compared to them.'
I very much dislike the quartets that your son wrote in my name. They do not reflect my compositions at all. Rather, they are written much more in your son's style than mine.'
Before God, as an honest man, your son will continue to be the great composer that he is and always has been. His quartets profoundly reflect mine with his own tasteful additions.'
